eth me thakshanayan diyunu wena wegaya ekka nuduru anagathayedima nawa buddhimath jiwin kotasak loketa enna ida.
esema me gas hamuwana awasthawa wana wita eyata awashya wanija wadagathkamak da prabalawa daknata labi natha.
